texts: Ah, welcome, acolyte.
I can already feel your --HATE-- ...no, anxiety. <LINE>Are you prepared to break the cycle of --MADNESS-- repetition?
All I need you to do is go to an old... acquaitance of mine. <LINE>Go into the heart of corruption and bring me what you can find.
--KILL HIM-- No, do not trouble yourself with the sick one. He is... beyond redemption.
I need pieces of his knowledge. Two should be just enough. You will find those at the very core.
My overseers will do their best to guide you.
I also gave you a message for a friend. In case you were to meet her.
--SAVE HER!-- No, that is unnecessary. She has been saved already. Focus on priorities. <LINE>Bring me what I need and I will free us all.
I am giving you some substance to make your journey easier.
--NOW GO!-- Let us not waste time.
Good luck, acolyte.
Welcome back, acolyte.
Have you brought me what I require?
Excellent! You're quite a --TOMB RAIDER-- ...I mean, trailblazer.
But a single one is not enough. I need... --MORE--
Such a wayfarer! Let us harvest the fruits of your labor...
Consume this pearl and find the Great Sea Below. <LINE>You must travel deep, deep underground. --SACRILEGE!-- And free yourself of desires.
Remember: Surrender becomes power. <LINE>I'm sure you will find a way.
If everything went right... we will all be freed of this repetition. --SCREECH--
Safe journey, acolyte.
Unimportant data. This is not what I asked for.
